title: Research
desc: Investigate a topic that you haven't worked on before

title: Deep Dive
desc: Research one specific element of a subject

title: Implementation
desc: Perhaps it's time to apply some of the concepts you've researched

title: Refactor
desc: Maybe some of that code needs additional TLC

title: Revision
desc: Why not revisit a concept you've written about and see whether it might benefit from a fresh perspective

title: Reading
desc: Read an article you haven't read before

title: Pipeline
desc: Try a different approach to how you process a subject - maybe start with the conclusion and work your way backwards

title: Analysis
desc: Find a way to improve any part of your thesis (wording, structure, ...) in its current state
